publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3942 Pauline McNeill: Celebrating Part 1 of the Land Reform Act—That the Parliament commemorates the first anniversary of the access provisions of the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2003 coming into force and congratulates all the agencies involved in securing a successful first year; welcomes and supports initiatives by the Scottish Executive and local authorities to resource access and calls on them to continue to increase the core path network and improve signage; further calls on all public and other agencies to continue to defend and enforce the provisions of the Act to secure the preventative health and social justice benefits of the outdoors for all, and continues to recognise the contribution of land reform campaigners in improving the nation’s quality of life. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3942 Pauline McNeill: Celebrating Part 1 of the Land Reform Act—That the Parliament commemorates the first anniversary of the access provisions of the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2003 coming into force and congratulates all the agencies involved in securing a successful first year; welcomes and supports initiatives by the Scottish Executive and local authorities to resource access and calls on them to continue to increase the core path network and improve signage; further calls on all public and other agencies to continue to defend and enforce the provisions of the Act to secure the preventative health and social justice benefits of the outdoors for all, and continues to recognise the contribution of land reform campaigners in improving the nation’s quality of life. Supported by: Donald Gorrie

S2M-3942 Celebrating Part 1 of the Land Reform Act (lodged on 9 February 2006) Scott Barrie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Sarah Boyack*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Marlyn Glen*, Bristow Muldoon*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*
S2M-3942 Celebrating Part 1 of the Land Reform Act (lodged on 9 February 2006) Cathie Craigie*, Trish Godman*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Des McNulty*, Nora Radcliffe*
